LanguageData.SZMechNeko_NekoAssemblier.label: neko assemblier
LanguageData.SZMechNeko_NekoAssemblier.description: A work station for assembling neko components, also could product some producions with them.
LanguageData.SZMechNeko_FuelBattery.label: gather link battery
LanguageData.SZMechNeko_FuelBattery.description: A battery that gets electricity by cracking the loaded fuel, detects the remaining charge at regular intervals, and then converts the fuel into electricity.
